name: Ravenous Hydra
passive: Cleave: Basic attacks deal physical damage to enemies behind the target equal to 60% AD.
tips: Ravenous HydraAttacks deal bonus damage in a areaRavenous Crescent (Active):  When activated, your attcks over the 9s deal physical damage equal to 14 AD as splash damage to nearby enemies.
Melee attacks deal splash damage in a bigger area than ranged attacks.

(30s Cooldown) 500


This enchant turns your boots into a deadly whirlwind: after activation, your attacks briefly explode, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.
Melee hits cover a larger area, but ranged champions benefit too.
— Perfect for bruisers and tanks who want to make every strike an AOE threat in skirmishes.
